def index
  @group = Group.find(params[:group_id]) if params[:group_id].present?
  @posts = @group.posts.order('sent_at DESC') if @group
  @title = t :current_posts
  @navable = @group
end

def show
  @post = Post.find(params[:id])
  @title = @post.subject
  @navable = @post.group
end
